description: The '73 Skyline graphic riffs on a label we sewed on Patagonia gear back in the day. Fast-forward to now, and we're in business to save our home planet. Conserving resources is one way to help, so this everyday-weight, long-sleeved T-shirt is made with fabric scraps and recycled bottles, so this garment reduces our reliance on virgin materials. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Forge Mark Uprisal Hoody - Unisex
